definitions.definition: Pertaining to or resembling twilight; faintly illuminated; obscure.
Synonym of mesopelagic ( “ Describing the pelagic zone of the ocean between the photic epipelagic and the aphotic bathypelagic zones, characterized by very minimal light . ” )

main_definition: Pertaining to or resembling twilight; faintly illuminated; obscure.
secondary_definitions: Synonym of mesopelagic ( “ Describing the pelagic zone of the ocean between the photic epipelagic and the aphotic bathypelagic zones, characterized by very minimal light . ” )
